name: Har ki Doon
description: Took this shot of heavenly 'Har ki Doon' (The valley of Gods) after trekkin for 3 days (30 Kilometres) through the folds of Himalayas. Have to stand on a cliff to take this shot of flowing Tons river through the Shivling (religious symbol in hinduism representing Shiva as the generative power). This shot shows the way to Heaven from the valley to the Swargrohini (Stairway to Heaven). According to Hindu mithology, only King Yudhishthira was able to climb it & entered Swarga(heaven) without dying.
